Event.PageTitle: South Indian Society Presents Athai Engey on 20th Mar 2010
Event.MetaDescription: A Full length hilarious Tamil drama Athai Engey, a Bharati Talkies production on 20th Mar 2010 at Wembley, London.
Event.EventHeading: SIS Presents Hilarious Tamil Drama Athai Engey
Event.Address: Patidar Hall, London Road, Wembley, HA9 7EX.
Event.Maindescription:
On behalf of "Bharati Talkies" and Nat Natarajan, we are pleased to inform you about the staging of a full length hilarious Tamil drama Athai Engey? written and directed by Nat Natarajan.

Admission: Â£6 per person. (Children below 6 years free)

As we are expecting a full house, we strongly recommend you please book your seats early by contacting a member of Bharati Talkies team

We request you to kindly forward this information to your friends who may be interested in attending and enjoying the drama.

Looking to seeing you on the 20th March in our search for the ATHAI.

Cast: Chandrasekhar, Gayatri, Hari, Indhu, Srilatha, Mythili, Nat, Padmanabhan, Raji, Ramakrishnan, Subramanian, Vinita, Vijay and others...
